\documentclass[23pt, a1paper, portrait, colspace = 0.5cm, innermargin = 0.6cm,
blockverticalspace = 0.7cm]{tikzposter}
\input{colors.tex}
\usecolorstyle{myColorStyle}
\usetitlestyle{Default}
\useblockstyle[titleinnersep = 0.5cm]{Default}
\tikzposterlatexaffectionproofoff
\usetikzlibrary{positioning}
\usepackage{amssymb,amsmath}
\usepackage[table]{xcolor}
\usepackage{tabularx}

\usepackage{blindtext}
\usepackage{caption}
\usepackage{subcaption}



%% --- Korrekt link mellem Figur og Subfig ---
\newcounter{subfigcount}

% Denne linje tvinger referencen til at være "Figurnummer(Subbogstav)"
\renewcommand{\thesubfigcount}{\thefigure(\alph{subfigcount})}

\newcommand{\mysubcaption}[1]{%
    \vskip 0.5cm 
    \refstepcounter{subfigcount} % Gør tælleren aktiv for \label
    {\small \textbf{(\alph{subfigcount})} #1}% Vi skriver kun (a) under billedet
}

\setlength{\extrarowheight}{3pt}


\usepackage{environ}
\setlength{\tabcolsep}{10pt} % default er 6pt
